definition: to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before

sentences.english: Now that the exam is near, the students are really going at their studies.
sentences.chinese: 考期臨近了，所以學生們確實在刻苦鑽研。

sentences.english: The nearby world of Hypori was another.
sentences.chinese: 臨近的海波里星是另一個。

sentences.english: Towards the end, it's Grenade spamming gone overboard.
sentences.chinese: 臨近結束時，它的榴彈的垃圾郵件了過分。

sentences.english: The fighting was so heavy that the Benjamites did not realize how near disaster was.
sentences.chinese: 便雅憫人卻不知道災禍臨近了。

sentences.english: What do you do, then, if you happen to end up with the wrong trill note at the end?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，如果你在臨近尾聲時彈錯了顫音上，該怎麼辦？

sentences.english: But a face-off may be looming.
sentences.chinese: 不過一場爭論還是悄然臨近了。

sentences.english: Location. Titanic De Luxe Beach and Resort Hotel is located near Antalya, Turkey.
sentences.chinese: 泰坦尼克號海灘度假酒店臨近土耳其的安塔利亞。

sentences.english: Another 1,500 tons is being pumped from two nearby buildings.
sentences.chinese: 另外1500噸水正從臨近兩座建築排出。

sentences.english: Mud surrounds several of the buildings near the river’s edge and branches into adjacent streets.
sentences.chinese: 淤泥包圍了沿河的建築，並湧進臨近的街巷。

sentences.english: All giant cell tumors appear to be located at or near the foramen of Monro.
sentences.chinese: 所有的鉅細胞瘤均位於或者臨近孟氏孔。

sentences.english: Sun Shaoping knew that the family's situation was on the edge of collapse.
sentences.chinese: 少平知道，家裏的光景現在已經臨近崩潰。

sentences.english: A city of east-central Illinois adjoining Champaign.
sentences.chinese: 烏爾班納伊利諾伊州中東部的城市，臨近尚佩恩。

sentences.english: The days of visitation are come, the days of recompence are come;
sentences.chinese: 以色列人必知道降罰的日子臨近，報應的時候來到。

sentences.english: You are emaciated and ill-looking , you are near to death!
sentences.chinese: 你消瘦羸弱，氣色不好，死亡已經臨近。

sentences.english: Many of the worshippers were from the neighboring state of Punjab.
sentences.chinese: 很多朝聖者來自臨近的旁遮普邦。

sentences.english: With an election, the uncertainties only multiply.
sentences.chinese: 隨着選舉臨近，不確定性在增加。

definition: on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
